value: VideoLingo: Connecting Every Frame Across the World

Hello, thank you for visiting VideoLingo. This project is currently under construction. If you encounter any issues, please feel free to ask questions on Github or in the QQ group! We will present more features in the near future. Thank you for your understanding!

2. Sentence segmentation using Spacy and Claude
Currently, merging Chinese subtitles on Linux displays garbled characters. Please download the srt file and process it yourself.

Audio processing is complete! You can check the audio files in the `output` folder.
The dubbing feature is still under development and temporarily disabled. Thank you for your understanding!
Please ensure the API_KEY supports claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620
No need to add v1 suffix, it will be automatically appended /v1/chat/completions
Used for calling whisperX api, get it from: https://replicate.com/account/api-tokens
'auto' for automatic recognition, 'en' to force English recognition or transcription
Use natural language description, e.g.: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese
Maximum number of characters per line of subtitles, calculated based on English. For Chinese, it will be automatically multiplied by 1.75. Default is 80
Considering the audience, translated subtitles are usually larger than the original language. Default is set to 1.5 times the length
Remember to click the 'Save' button below
